title: Finding the x and y Intercepts
body: $$y=\left(-x^2\right)+8x+19$$: Find the y intercept then the x intercept. Write the answer as a string: eg. (0,y), (x,0), (x,0). For the x intercepts write the smaller x intercepts first. If there are no x intercepts write DNE for Does Not Exist.
lesson: 10.5 Graphing Quadratic Equations in Two Variables
